body.name: [MFi Certificated] [No subscriptions] GPS Tracker Tag for Vehicles, Car, Wallet, Dogs, Motorcycle. Working with Apple Find My. Unlimited Distance. 1 Year Battery Life. Small, Portable. (Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 20 hrs 2 mins
features: Location Tracking: It tracks the location of the item it is attached to; This allows users to find lost items using their iPhone's Find My app
Precision Finding: It cans also use the iPhone's camera and AR technology to guide users to the exact location of their lost item, making it easier to locate in crowded or hard-to-see places
Replaceable Battery: The device has a replaceable battery that lasts for about a year; When the battery runs out, users can replace it themselves
Water-resistant: The device is water-resistant, which means it can withstand splashes and rain, making it suitable for outdoor use
body.description: This product is a small device that can be attached to personal items such as keys, bags, or wallets to help users locate them if they are misplaced.

productInformation.name: Specific Uses For Product
productInformation.value: It only works with Apple. Your Tag sends out a secure signal that can be detected by nearby devices in the Find My network. These devices send the location of your Tag to iCloud — then you can go to the Find My app and see it on a map. The whole process is anonymous and encrypted to protect your privacy. According to Apple policies, if the device is not with its owner and is with another person after a while, you will be notified that the tracker is nearby. These features were created to prevent unwanted people from being tracked. See more

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am absolutely impressed with this GPS tracker. Not only is it easy to install, but its precision is amazing. I have been using this device in my car for a while and it has exceeded all my expectations. The mobile application is the one for my cell phone and it allows me to monitor the location of my car in real time without problems. Also, the battery life is impressive, which means I can rely on it even on long trips. Without a doubt, this GPS tracker has improved the security and peace of mind that I feel knowing where my car is at all times. Highly recommended!"

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Hard to reset! if at all!
reviews.reviewText: When I first got it I uploaded on to my iphone to make sure it was working, which was fine. Then when I went to give it to my wife to use on her phone, I removed it from my phone and did reset it to the factory settings it would not be recognized and found on her iphone after following all of the instructions on the set-up manual. And there is no Tech Support for this model tag at all! Ended up tossing out and buying an apple air-tag instead. We would not buy another at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am delighted with this GPS tracker for my purse. Not only is it unobtrusively compact, but it also has a design that perfectly suits my style. Setup was straightforward and the accompanying app is very easy to use. Now I can carry my wallet with confidence, knowing that I can track its location at any time. The battery life is surprisingly long, making it a reliable companion for my busy days. Without a doubt, this GPS tracker has added an extra level of security to my belongings. I highly recommend it to all women who want more peace of mind!”

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It gives me exact location, but it won't update after looking at it several times, and moving locations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars EZ Setup, Works Great! Poor Battery Life 🪫
reviews.reviewText: Pros: Super easy setup, works great.Cons: Horrible battery life.SETUP: Hold the button on the Tracker down for a few seconds and open the Apple “Find My” app. Tap “Items” then tap the “+”. Tap “Add Other Item” when it finds your new Tracker name it and tap “Continue”. The “Find My” app will ask for confirmation.. tap continue, then finish and you’re good to go.THE BAD: I bought 2 trackers and started using one as soon as it arrived to track my dog. 10 days later, the battery icon indicated that the battery was low. Maybe this was a fluke, or just cheap batteries. Either way, I replaced batteries in both my trackers with Energizer Lithium batteries. (It doesn’t take C batteries, like in the description says, obviously — The battery number it takes is 2032). Opening the case takes more than a thumbnail. I used my pocket knife to open them on the only corner that you’re able to.Other than the battery issue, I really like these. If someone jacks any of my stuff, it won’t alert them of its presence. This allows me time to find my item and take the appropriate measures to retrieve it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Never lose my keys again
reviews.reviewText: I lose my keys constantly. Not like leaving them in a foreign place but in my house or in my bag or in the black hole that is my couch. Right when I need to leave I can’t find them. This little thing has already been a life saver from the first day I installed it and attached it to my keys. Way cheaper than an apple air tag and does the same thing. Super small and compact and the speaker is loud enough to hear from the other room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Simple and easy to connect to any smartphone, and does its job. I would order more for my kids vehicle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not fast enough
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my cat so I can track him when he goes outside. It does work… but it doesn’t update immediately. It’s been as much as 30 minutes that I’ve waited for it to update to his location. It also isn’t very specific. It’ll say he’s at the house with us, but he could be on any side of the house or out past the back fence. For a few dollars more I’m just getting name brand next time.
